mapper.insert:
insert into matridx_yghtxx(yghmcid,yghtid,htqsr,htdqr,lrry,lrsj,scbj) values
( #{item.yghmcid},#{item.yghtid},cast(#{item.htqsr} as date),cast(#{item.htdqr} as date),#{item.lrry},LOCALTIMESTAMP ,'0' )
mapper.select: select yghtxx.yghmcid,yghtxx.yghtid,yghtxx.htqsr,yghtxx.htdqr,case when fj.zywid is not null then '1' else '0' end fjbj from matridx_yghtxx yghtxx left join matridx_fjcfb fj on fj.zywid=yghtxx.yghtid and fj.scbj='0' where yghtxx.yghmcid = #{yghmcid} and yghtxx.scbj ='0' group by yghtxx.yghmcid,yghtxx.yghtid,yghtxx.htqsr,yghtxx.htdqr,fj.zywid order by yghtxx.htqsr
